turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Sandy on 362nd Ave

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What seasonal drinks does Starbucks have right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have an Eggnog Latte you may want to try

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't like Eggnog, do they have anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You may like the new Chestnut Praline Latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How many calories does it have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A Grande has 330 calories.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not too bad, I will take one of those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes are availabe?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The drink comes in Short, Tall, Venti or Grande

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which is the largest?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Venti is the largest.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK, I'll order a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does Starbucks carry coconut milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they also have almond and soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will actually get it with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream on the top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Definitely!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does anything come on top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, spiced praline crumbs.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Please confirm you would like a Venti Chestnut Praline Latte with almond milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your order has been placed.
